| 10  | Stockport     | 10,900   | Yes    |
| 11  | Glasgow       | 10,887   | Yes    |

### Conclusion:
None of the countries listed have at least three closed stadiums with capacities over 10,000. Thus, the answer is:

$\boxed{\text{FALSE}}$
